title: Rasoul Khorvash
text:
Rasoul Khrovash (; born 30 January 1953 in <a href="Isfahan">Isfahan</a>) is a retired <a href="Iran">Iran</a>ian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>. He is currently the team manager at <a href="Sepahan%20F.C.">Sepahan</a>. He is graduated from the <a href="University%20of%20Texas">University of Texas</a> in sports and before this, he was graduated from <a href="Isfahan%20University">Isfahan University</a> in geographical. He is the brother of Mostafa Khorvash and cousin of Shokrallah Khorvash, the founder of <a href="Sepahan%20F.C.">Sepahan</a>.
Playing career.
Khorvash is one of the former players of Sepahan which he began his football career at the age of 8 in <a href="Sepahan%20F.C.">Sepahan academy</a> and was promoted to the first team when he was 16. He was retired in 1984 when playing for Sepahan. His usual post was left midfielder.
After retirement.
He was appointed as team manager of Sepahan on 9 November 2011.
